nodes.text: DP-6 Guard Droid was a battle droid of the reconstituted Sith Empire in use during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY it protected the base of Darth Thanaton in the Museum of Corellian Industry, where it was destroyed by Thanaton's rival Kallig.
DP-6 Guard Droid appears in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Corellia.
